word:
Willie, please write me how you employ your mind. What progress do you make in the school of Christ? Are you seeking for humility? and are you 


                                    -52- 

trying to speak and act in that way which will increase your confidence in God? Do you pray? Watch and pray lest ye enter into temptation. Now dear son, watch and pray. If there are boys or girls whom you know are evil you should remain away from them--not place yourself in their society.
